#define CHECK_SVN_VERSION
 

Value:

(major,minor) \
    (SVN_VER_MAJOR > (major) || \
    (SVN_VER_MAJOR == (major) && SVN_VER_MINOR > (minor))
Check if the current version of the subversion API is at least major.minor
